  • public interface IEurosonicUTExtraFeatures
    Interface to control extra features from UT system

        Get number of temperature sensor on the UT card
        Returns:

      • getTemperatureSensorValue

        Parameters:
        index - Sensor index (0
        Returns:
        Temperature in °C

      • setIOConfig

        void setIOConfig(short ioport,
               int value)
        Set Input/Output port on the UT card READ USER MANUAL FROM SYSTEM BEFORE USE, ONLY AVAILABLE WITH 110
        Parameters:
        ioport - Port number - 0 : Port encoder 1 - 1 : Port encoder 2
        value - Port configuration - Disabled = 0x0000 - UTC110_IOMODE_ENCODERINPUT = 0x0001 - UTC110_IOMODE_ENCODERTRIGINPUT = 0x0002 - UTC110_IOMODE_DAISYCHAININPUT = 0x0004 - UTC110_IOMODE_DAISYCHAINOUTPUT = 0x0008 The port encoder 1 can’t be setup with UTC110_IOMODE_DAISYCHAINOUTPUT. The port encoder 2 can’t be setup with UTC110_IOMODE_ENCODERTRIGINPUT or UTC110_IOMODE_DAISYCHAININPUT.
